title: Differential Equation with slope field part - c

content.question: Find the particular solution y = f(x) to the differential equation with the initial condition f(3) = -1 and state its domain.

frqParts.text: Find the particular solution y = f(x) to the differential equation with the initial condition f(3) = -1 and state its domain.

topic.text: 7.7: Finding Particular Solutions Using Initial Conditions and Separation of Variables
